|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = Digital Temperature Sensor w/ Fan Control;National Semi;LM63;;1;,,, Octal Int. 802.3bt-Compliant PSE Controller;Broadcom;BCM59121;;3;,,, Serial Management IF/Shift Register LED Controller;Realtek;RTL8231;;1;,,, High Speed 10Mbit/s TTL Compatible Optocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-M601;;2;,,, Single-Phase Synchronous PWM Controller;Anpec;APW8828;;1;,,, Dual Retriggerable Monostable Multivibrator;NXP;74HC123D;;1;,,, 8-bit Serial-In, Parallel-Out Shift Register;NXP;74HC164D;;8;,,, 30V, 5A Dual P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4803;;1;,,, 30V, 50A N-Channel MOSFET;Sinopower;SM3119NA;;1;,,, 30V, 58A N-Channel MOSFET;Sinopower;SM3116NA;;1;,,, 100-V,150-mA Buck Switching Regulator;TI;LM5009A;;1;,,, 3-State Quad Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;74LVC125A;;1;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;LVC244A;;2;,,, 1A Silicon Rectifier;SeCoS GmbH;SM4004;;24;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;LiteOn;LTV-817;;1;,,, Quad 2-input AND gate;NXP;74LVC08A;;3;,,, |flags = Smart switch, PoE+ switch, 4x SFP/RJ45 Combo ports, LACP, SNMP, RSTP, MSTP, heatsink, metal case, fan,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2017 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |newegg = 9SIAFSWBHT2248 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |asin = B00R49FDB6 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8382M Multi-Layer Managed :Switch Controller w/ Embedded [[MIPS 4KEc]] @500MHz *Co-processor: [[Nuvoton]] [https://www.nuvoton.com/products/microcontrollers/arm-cortex-m0-mcus/m051-base-series/m0516lde/?__locale=en M0516LDE] to manage PoE *Flash/RAM: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 256MB RAM (DDR3) *LAN: 24x Gigabit (RJ45) 802.3at PoE Ethernet ports, :4x GbE SFP/RJ45 Shared slots, :56Gbps switching capacity, Rack mountable (1U, 19") *PoE: 802.3af (PoE), 802.3at (PoE+), 185W PoE budget
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:TPE-2840WS_v2_d02_2-(front).png| File:TPE-2840WS_v2_d03_2-(back).png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:TRENDnet TPE-2840WS-A V2.1R.jpeg|PCB, PSU File:TRENDnet TPE-2840WS-A V2.1R Board.jpeg|Main board File:TRENDnet TPE-2840WS-A V2.1R PoE.jpeg|PoE board </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
